articles.author: Dana M Bergstrom
articles.title: I've spent 40 years studying Antarctica. The frozen continent has never needed our help more - The Conversation
articles.description: After several decades in research, including 22 years at the Australian Antarctic Division, this scientist is standing up for our icy continent. Here’s why Antarctic research needs ongoing funding.
articles.content: After decades immersed in Antarctic science, Ive learned that physical and biological changes rarely occur smoothly. More often than not, they unfold in sharp steps. Right now, Antarcticas climate an… [+5531 chars]
